t:type.name: GoogleDeviceInfo
t:type.t:description: Represents a the device info model used by Google.

t:attribute.name: model
t:attribute.description: The model or SKU for the device

t:attribute.name: hwVersion
t:attribute.description: Specific version number attached to the hardware

t:attribute.name: swVersion
t:attribute.description: Specific version number attached to the firmware
